title: Love Where You Live.
posting_body: ['Capitola Terrace Apartments is located in Capitola, just a short distance away from Capitola Village, Gayle’s Bakery, Santa Cruz, Soquel and Aptos.', 'At Capitola Terrace Apartments we are dedicated to providing you with the perfect place to call home.', 'Attention to detail and quality customer service are just a few of the ways that we achieve this goal.', 'Our beautiful apartment community is located within minutes to amazing shopping centers like Capitola Mall and downtown Santa Cruz, many restaurants, movie theaters, a variety of grocery stores and schools.', 'Capitola Terrace Apartments is also in perfect location near Highway 1 with easy access to Highway 17.', 'Call us to schedule your tour today!', 'Apartment Home Description:', 'Rent starting from:  $3,000', 'Deposit starting from:  $6000', 'Apartment Type: 2 Bedroom 1 Bath', 'Apartment Amenities:', '•\tSpacious 2 Bedroom Apartment Homes', '•\tCeiling Fan', '•\tDishwasher', '•\tFridge', '•\tDisposal', '•\tPlenty of kitchen cupboard space', '•\tSpacious kitchen and dining area', '•\tCable ready', '•\tLarge closets', '•', 'Community Amenities:', '•\tPrivate patio or balcony', '•\tLaundry room', '•\tAssigned carport parking', '•\tOff street parking', '•\tProfessional On-site management', '•\t24-hour emergency reply', '•\tConvenient location', '•', 'Pet Policy:', '•\tNo Pets Please', '*Photos may be of a similar unit and not actual unit.', 'Contact: Marla Stalians, Community Manager', 'Open Monday to Friday', 'Phone number:', 'show contact info', '<URL>/', 'Professionally managed by Prodesse Property Group']
